title: 80s Ambient Music Pack 2
description: This is a music pack featuring sixteen unique 80's styled ambient instrumental tracks versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The 80's Ambient Music Pack 2! This is an asset pack that contains seventeen ambient instrumentals geared towards the decade of 1980. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


A Whale's Song - E Major 134 BPM

Ambient Skies - C Major 110 BPM

Blue Caverns - D Major 70 BPM

Chrysalis - A Major - 139 BPM

Come Back To Me - Eb Major 70 BPM

Deep Space Journey - C Major 115 BPM

Galactic Realms - B Minor 156 BPM

Gathering Courage - C Minor - 121 BPM

Inner Space - Eb Major 71 BPM

Laser Grid - A Major 110 BPM

Music Of The Stars - D Major 132 BPM

New Outlook - A Major 147 BPM

Sakura Petals - Ab Minor - 70 BPM

Space Kingdom - C Minor 71 BPM

The Chosen One - C Minor 127 BPM

The Runner - A Major - 110 BPM 2


Audio Preview:
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Number of Audio Cues: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes
